# Data overview

For this analysis I have used the following data:

1) Our MCF10A cell lines:
+ WT;
+ H1047R mutant;
+ PTEN-/- mutant;
2) MCA10A cell line from [Hart, J. R. et al. The butterfly effect in cancer: A single base mutation can remodel the cell. Proc. Natl. Acad. Sci. U. S. A. 112, 1131–1136 (2015)](https://paperpile.com/shared/ZPZhG6):
+ WT;
+ H1047R mutant;
3) MCF10A cell line from [Klijn, C. et al. A comprehensive transcriptional portrait of human cancer cell lines. Nat. Biotechnol. 33, 306–312 (2015)](https://paperpile.com/shared/99kMiR):
+ WT;
+ **waiting for reply about PTEN-/- mutant**;
4) Human prostate epithelium cell line RWPE-1 from [Severson, P. L., Tokar, E. J., Vrba, L., Waalkes, M. P. & Futscher, B. W. Coordinate H3K9 and DNA methylation silencing of ZNFs in toxicant-induced malignant transformation. Epigenetics 8, 1080–1088 (2013)](https://paperpile.com/shared/Dxx5n5):
+ WT;
